root.publications: von Strahlenberg, Phillip Johann. 1730. Gentium Boreo-Orientali um Vulgo Tatarorum Harmonia Linguarum, Das Nord- und Ostliche Theil von Europa und Asia.
root.pub-comments: Title in English: Concordances between the languages of the Tatar and Northeastern peoples; subtitle: Specimen einiger Zahlen und Wörter dere in dem Nord-Ostlichen Theil von Europa und Asia wohnenden Tatar- und Finno-[Genth]ischen Abstämmlings-Völker; Aus welchem nebst andern historischen Umständen zu ersehen sein wird wie solche vor Zeiten entweder unter sich oder mit andern Westlichen Völkern combinirt gewesen; ihre Wohnstellen aber können in der neuen edirten Charte gefunden werden (translation of subtitle: Some specimens of some numbers and terms of the peoples of Tatar and Finno-[Genth]ic descent living in the North-Eastern part of Europe and Asia; of which (ref. to specimen) in addition to historical circumstances it will become clear that long ago they (ref. to peoples) were related either amongst each other or with other Western peoples; however, their dwellings can be found in the new edited map/charter); scholar seems to see a geographical rather than a linguistic connection between the different classes, the exceptions seem to be class IV and V which he groups together completely.
root.tree-val: Gentium Boreo-Orientalium Vulgo Tatarorum Harmonia Linguarum: von Strahlenberg 1730
root.pri-name: Gentium Boreo-Orientali um Vulgo Tatarorum[;] Harmonia Linguarum

tree.description: Gentium Boreo-Orientalium Vulgo Tatarorum Harmonia Linguarum: von Strahlenberg 1730
